song.title: Dream Alone
song.info:
[i]Lyrics:
a little girl is dreaming of the sky looking for the love she heard about she wonders if it's all a lie and then she starts to shout
why can't i have that feeling, why can't i fall in love? why does noone care what i'm dreaming of?
why can't i find the feeling, why can't i have my love? is it too much to ask a little girl dreaming of wonderful butterflies asking me to join them but then i realized i'm dreaming alone
a little girl is dreaming of the sky looking for the love she heard about she wonders if it's all a lie and then she starts to shout
why can't i share my feeling, why can i never find my love? why does noone truly know what i'm dreaming of?[/i]
